00019 #ifndef SOCKETTEXTHANDLER_H
00020 #define SOCKETTEXTHANDLER_H
00021 
00022 #include <map>
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include "util/SocketHandler.h"
00025 
00026 
00027 /**
00028  * Basic Socket Handler (Listener) that parses out
00029  * verbose and progress messages from a socket stream.
00030  */
00031 class SocketTextHandler : public SocketHandler {
00032 
00033 public: 
00034   
00035   /// Constructor
00036   SocketTextHandler();
00037 
00038   /// Has the socket send the "completion" message?
00039   bool hasFinished();
00040 
00041   
00042   /// was the run successful?
00043   bool successfulRun();
00044 
00045   /** 
00046    * Take a message and do whatever functionality this handler
00047    * implements from simply displaying message to 
00048    * 
00049    * @param type - What type (i.e. text, xml, ) of message is this message.
00050    * @param channel - What channel (i.e. verbose, progress, etc.) is this message.
00051    * @param msg - Data to be parsed out
00052    */
00053   virtual void handleMessage(int type, int channel, const std::string &msg);
00054 
00055 protected:
00056   bool m_Finished; ///< Has the socket sent the "completed" signal?
00057   bool m_SuccessfulRun;  // was the run succesful or aborted
00058 
00059 };
00060 
00061 #endif /* SOCKETTEXTHANDLER_H */
